TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件發生之前控制項加入至頁面。The event occurs before a control is added to a page. 有一些常見的案例，其中加入一個控制項的頁面。There are a number of common scenarios where a control can be added to a page. 如需這些的完整說明，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節方法。For a full description of these, see the Remarks section for the method. 類別會提供有關正在加入至頁面的 Web 組件控制項的屬性存取。The class provides access to properties about the Web Parts control being added to the page. 當控制項加入時，必須檢查以查看是否其屬性已設定且，若是如此，是否在控制項已獲授權加入至頁面。When a control is added, it must be checked to see whether its property has been set and, if so, whether the control is authorized to be added to the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs (Type type, string path, string authorizationFilter, bool isShared);

span.span: The relative application path to the source file for the control being authorized, if the control is a user control.

span.span: An arbitrary string value assigned to the property of a control, used for authorizing whether a control can be added to a page.

param.name: isShared
param.span: 指出正在檢查授權的控制項是否為共用控制項，表示對應用程式的多數或所有使用者都是可見，並且其 屬性值設為 。

span.span: Indicates whether the control being checked for authorization is a shared control, meaning that it is visible to many or all users of the application, and its property value is set to .

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a Web Parts control is visible to all users of a Web Parts page.

span.span: if the Web Parts control is visible to all users of the page; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 共用的 Web 組件控制項使用者都可以看到所有的網頁。A shared Web Parts control is visible to all users of a Web page. 共用控制的相反是每個使用者控制項，這是特定使用者，只能將該控制項加入至頁面的使用者看見。The opposite of a shared control is a per-user control, which is user-specific and is visible only to the user who added that control to the page. 如果使用者共用的個人化範圍中檢視網頁時，會加入一個動態控制項，控制項將會共用。If a dynamic control is added while a user is viewing the page in shared personalization scope, the control will be shared. 如果控制項已加入但使用者卻使用者個人化範圍，該控制項的屬性值將是`false`。If the control is added while the user is in user personalization scope, the property value for that control will be `false`. 如需有關共用和每個使用者控制項，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information about shared and per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
